div.pre: 1885 Strongoli (anc. Petelia), 25 km. N of Croton, Bruttium, 1955 Burial: 480-470 B.C. (K) Contents: 13 AR. Pot hoard, probably all recovered Taras: 1 st. (as Vlasto Cat. 93) Metapontum: 4 incuse st. (2 spread; 2 medium as Noe 164, 202) Poseidonia: 3 st. (early double-relief) Caulonia: 1 st. (as Noe F, no. 90?) Croton: 4 incuse st. (2 spread; 2 medium with heron symbol) Disposition: Reggio Procopio, AIIN 1960-1, p. 59, illus.
